tool_description: Natural Gas News API collects news articles about natural gas from reputable news companies in Germany. Either all articles from today can be queried or articles from a specific source.
name: Natural Gas News Germany
title: Natural Gas News Germany

api_list.name: Query article from specific news source
api_list.description:
This endpoint allows you to query articles from a specific news source.

Possible news sources include:

- tagesschau
- n-tv
- faz
- sueddeutsche
- welt
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://natural-gas-news-germany.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/articles/tagesschau"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "natural-gas-news-germany.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://natural-gas-news-germany.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/articles/{source}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "natural-gas-news-germany.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query articles from all news sources
api_list.description: With this endpoint, you will get the articles **from all the registered news sources** at once. Registered news sources are: Tagesschau, n-tv, Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung, Sueddeutsche and Welt.
